column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH  – An American man was found dead on Monday
column6: at 11:00 pm in RS Guest House
column8: Daun Penh District.------Local authorities say STEPHEN PATRICK SITES
column10: was an American tourist.------An examination of the deceased concluded that he had died of a heart attack
column11: possibly sue to high blood pressure.------The body was taken to Stung Meanchey pagoda.
